name: High School Prom Salon: Spa, Makeover, and Make-Up Beauty Game for Little Kids (Boys & Girls)
name_original: High School Prom Salon: Spa, Makeover, and Make-Up Beauty Game for Little Kids (Boys & Girls)
description:
Are you ready to go to the prom?

Make sure you give yourself a makeover and a manicure to look your best for the prom!!

And don't forget to put on an eye-catching prom dress!!

Have soo much fun!
